question: did i make the HEALTHY choice ? a piece of wheat bread over pancakes ?!?
question_content: im trynna lose weight and i woke up from a nap and my sister made pancakes but when she cooks them she uses LOOOTS of butter ! and i havent ate much today cause of school/homework so it was REALLY hard to fight the urge off ! but instead i grabbed a piece of wheat  bread . :) was this healthy ?! i feel proud of myself !

answers.answer_content: Whole wheat bread is the best substitute for any fatty carbs! Yes you made the right choice, you can also have whole wheat bread with cottage cheese and cucumbers and make it a sandwich it tastes so good!!
Of course that was a healthy choice. Even tho both are carbs I'm assuming if you had the pancake it would be with butter, which is oil and fat, and with syrup, which is all sugar!
Yes! Pancakes were probably just refined flour, the whole wheat is healthier and will make you feel fuller :) Good job!
